1.title: Puzzle Huddle

Depending on a child’s fine motor skills, the puzzle can be ideal toddlers or young children.

1.title: Cultures, nations, and religions are not rocks – they’re always changing
1.subtitle: Learn more about Destiny Instinct. Failing to understand it blinds us to the revolutionary transformations in societies happening all around us.

2.title: Racism has a cost for everyone
2.subtitle: Racism makes our economy worse — and not just in ways that harm people of color, says public policy expert Heather C. McGhee. From her research and travels across the US, McGhee shares startling insights into how racism fuels bad policymaking and drains our economic potential — and offers a crucial rethink on what we can do to create a more prosperous nation for all.

2.title: Savor Seasoning Blends
2.subtitle: Savor Seasonings blends are handcrafted creations by the Spencer family; Dulani, Lisa and Myles.

products.name: Rubbed: Honey, It's BBQ
products.description: A honey based rub for your ribs, ham salmon. The honey base will give your meats a nice crispy, caramel crust.

products.name: Truffle Butter
products.description: Sweet cream butter, blended with Italian black truffles and truffle salt. Your potatoes, beef, pork, veggies, sourdough bread, pasta, seafood, rice and your tummy will thank you!

products.name: Vampire Salt (6oz Grinder)
products.description: A blend of garlic cloves and sea salt. It's just that simple. Try it on everything; soups, sauces, poultry, pork, beef, mashed potatoes, veggies.

3.title: Diva By Cindy
3.subtitle: Diva is for a woman who wants: Beauty, Excellence and Elegance in her hair. "DIVA" stands for: Divine, Inspired, Virtuous and Annointed. Thank you for using Diva by Cindy... the secret to Longer, Healthier Hair.

products.name: Super-Gro Haridress
products.description: Apply to scalp and temples for thinning hair to promote optimal hair growth. It tingles promoting circulation and healthy hair. Contains Shea Butter, Horse Tail, Menthol and Chamomile. Dry, Itchy, Flaky scalp is a thing of the past.

products.name: Leave-In Detangling Conditioner
products.description: The DIVA BY CINDY Leave-In Detangler eliminates dryness, brittleness, and limpness; and is especially good on over processed, dull hair. Penetrates the hair shaft quickly while detangling and adding sheen making it excellent for fine, limp hair and ideal for wraps and roller sets.

products.name: KURL POP Curl Hydration
products.description: This Leave in formula will leave your curls soft, moisturized and bouncy. Great on all curl types, can be used to define curls, twist and reactivate curls.

3.title: Sorella
3.subtitle: Sorella was founded by two Boss Babes, Heather Sanders & Brittney Turner in 2012. We were 20 years old with no fashion background or training but a lot of hustle and drive! Starting with an inventory of 10 products and packing packages on the floor of our apartment, we never imagined how far we would get!

products.name: Navy Tie Dye Pant Set
products.description: Navy Tie Dye Pant Set

products.name: Swish Seen It All T-Shirt
products.description: Shirt reads "I'm familiar with every ghetto". Shirts run oversize. For regular fit, we recommend going a size down

4.title: The Pan-African Congresses, 1900-1945
4.subtitle: In the nearly half century between 1900 and 1945, various political leaders and intellectuals from Europe, North America, and Africa met six times to discuss colonial control of Africa and develop strategies for eventual African political liberation.

4.title: The Afro Gypsy
4.subtitle: I create jewelry and accessories that enhance the uniqueness of you; we like to call it Bohemian with an AFRO-tude! My work predominantly consist of leather and metalwork items. But, considering my love for the extraordinary, you may stumble upon many other new or vintage items that could steal your heart!

products.name: Unisex African Bead Bracelets paired with Lava or Wood Beads
products.description: African Bead Bracelets paired with Lava or Wood Beads. Sultry and handsome, these bracelets are all hand made with stretch cord.

products.name: Handmade Journal

products.name: Large Amethyst Pendant Necklace
products.description: Hand wired Large Amethyst pendant necklace with 14K Antiqued GP chain and findings.

5.title: Reopen Sandra Bland's Case
5.subtitle: Sandra Bland was arrested for a traffic stop on July 10, 2015 by Brian Encinia.  She was found dead in her cell three days later. Encinia was never indicted, in spite of the fact, that he physically assaulted her her on camera. There is a new video that has come to light, which may have been hidden from the grand jury.

5.title: Spoon & Theory Handmade
5.subtitle: Spoon and Theory handmade is a black-owned creative arts, jewelry and aromatherapy goods store. We provide goods from upcycled leather to Eco-inspired laser cut jewelry + aromatherapy diffuser jewelry + aromatherapy body + home goods.

products.name: Jubilee Ankara Face Mask with Nose Bridge
products.description: Secure, then fasten the double strings around the base of head for comfortable yet snug fit, eliminating irritation behind ears. Minneapolis mask makers, quality face masks.

products.name: Nove Abstract Color Block Wood Earrings

products.name: Oatmeal and Spice Moisturizing Body Bar
products.description: This soap is great for those with suffer from dry skin. With warm hints of cinnamon and clove, the mild creamy exfoliating lather leaves skin feel smooth, soft and smelling delicious.

6.title: Coral Oral
6.subtitle: Not only are these toothbrushes more aesthetically pleasing, you differentiate each brush by its pattern and not by its color. Our company is proudly black owned and highlights oral health facts including a Black history fact that we all should know!

products.name: Medium 4-Pack
products.description: A full brush head and precision cut bristles to reach the tooth's total surface. Gently cleans and massages gums, tongue and teeth. Medium bristles sure not to cause any damage or pain!

products.name: Soft Single-Pack

6.title: Jarvis Boards
6.subtitle: Jarvis Boards' mission has always been to craft paddle boards in Austin, Texas that are environmentally friendly, look great, and perform well. To accomplish this, we employ a wide range of techniques to craft our small-batch production wooden SUPs in our Austin studio.

products.name: Hollow Core Paddle Board Frame Kits
products.description: There is something magical about creating something with your own two hands. Building your own hollow core paddle board will be one of the most rewarding projects that you'll tackle.

products.name: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hat
products.description: Let's Surf Y'all! Dad hats aren't just for dads. This one's got a low profile with an adjustable strap and curved visor. Available in khaki and light blue.

products.name: Surf Wax Candle
products.description: We teamed up with our friends at Jimbo's Surf Wax to create a unique line of surf wax candles. Each candle is slow cooked over a wood stove in Maine using surf wax and a hint of coconut.

7.title: Vera Institute of Justice
7.subtitle: Vera is powered by hundreds of advocates, researchers, and activists working to transform the criminal legal and immigration systems until they’re fair for all. Founded in 1961 to advocate for alternatives to money bail in New York City, Vera is now a national organization that partners with impacted communities and government leaders for change.

7.title: Big Mama's Sauce
7.subtitle: We believe that to be the best we must use only the best ingredients. This homemade recipe has been the highlight of our family gatherings since at least 2002…honestly Big Mama can’t even remember, that’s how long she been making it! Big Mama never liked store bought sauce and she wanted to serve only the best to her loved ones. So here we are…on the store shelf ironically! Lol…We hope you taste only love and enjoy just as our family has for all of these years!

8.title: The Sentencing Project
8.subtitle: The Sentencing Project promotes effective and humane responses to crime that minimize imprisonment and criminalization of youth and adults by promoting racial, ethnic, economic, and gender justice.

8.title: YTPshop - African Clothing
8.subtitle: All YTPshop products are crafted by women in Nigeria and the fabrics are carefully sourced from West African markets. YTPshop products are made with high-quality material, cutting edge tailoring, vibrant colors, and are affordably priced.

9.title: Cuff

products.name: Body and Hair Honey

products.description: The acai mango lotion is a rich and creamy facial moisturizer that is perfect for all skin types. This water-based product absorbs perfectly, and includes the all powerful acai and mango extracts, murumuru butter, rosemary and orange essential oils.

products.name: Kinks Curls & Coils Haircare Bundle
products.description: Bundle and Save! Treat your coils to a start to finish process of our amazing haircare line.

10.title: Esusu
10.subtitle: Forbes Under 30 social entrepreneurs, Nigerian-born entrepreneur Wemimo and his business partner Goel co-founded Esusu in 2019. The mobile platform helps individuals mostly from marginalized communities save money, access capital and build credit.

10.title: Eb + Flo Boutique
10.subtitle: Eb and Flo started out as just a vision and manifested in 2020. Our CEO, Ebony Hunter, is a strong believer in living out your dreams while not only looking good but feeling good too. Our mission is to provide styles that flow with you from moment to moment, whether you’re making a quick run to the grocery store or meeting the girls for brunch. With comfort and quality in mind, we make looking lavish easy. Look good, feel good.

products.name: Classic Boss Lady Track Suit
products.description: Chic track suit for the lady on the go. Throw it on for a quick trip to the grocery store, a nail appointment, or dress it up for a cute brunch look.

products.name: Tedy Soft Sherpa Jacket
products.description: The warmest and most comfortable jacket you'll ever own! The Teddy Sherpa Jacket feels like a warm hug or like you're wearing a blanket. Features a drawstring hem that allows you to snatch that waist hunny *snap*snap*

products.name: "Thou shall not try me" T-Shirt
products.description: Mood 24:7! Let the folks know the deal in this super soft tee.

11.title: So you want to talk about race
11.subtitle: Ijeoma Oluo guides readers of all races through subjects ranging from intersectionality and affirmative action to "model minorities" in an attempt to make the seemingly impossible possible: honest conversations about race and racism, and how they infect almost every aspect of American life.

11.title: Taste by Dannie K
11.subtitle: Taste by Dannie K is a black-owned lingerie company dedicated to the empowerment of women of all shades and sizes. It is our mission to help women realize that they are powerful beyond measure & that they don't have to tone down their super power of sexy to be taken seriously.

12.title: Ka'oir Fitness
12.subtitle: Ka'oir Fitness, founded in 2011 by celebrity Keyshia Ka'oir is a fitness line of patented, trademarked fat burners to help people lose weight faster than ever.

products.name: Ka'oir Waist Eraser™
products.description: Ka'oir Waist Eraser™ will have your waist, stomach & back looking amazing. This is a unisex fitness product which burns belly & back fat, sheds excess water and shrinks waist size....all while allowing your abs to be more visible. It allows you to spot train your stomach, back  & waist.

products.name: Ka'oir Body Sweat™
products.description: The Ka'oir Body Sweat is a state of the art "sweat" suit. It is very stretchy, flexible & comfortable for any workout. KA'OIR Body Sweat will make you sweat tremendously, your metabolism will increase, you will burn calories, lose weight & shed water!

products.name: Ka'oir Slimming Tea
products.description: KA’OIR Slimming Tea is a loose leaf tea packed in individual nylon tea bags that contains a powerful blend of natural ingredients to help slim your body! Each package includes 14 bags (78.4 grams) of detox tea, and is meant to be used every day or every other day.

12.title: Brimz Official
12.subtitle: The Brimz culture is a lifestyle choice, we are a community founded on a love for music, fashion and art. We celebrate diverse expression in our great city and a commitment to contributing to our community by supporting the arts. Wherever artistic expression exists, culture and progress are always by its side.

products.name: AJ1 Sneaker Hoodie
products.description: AJ1 inspired limited run

products.name: Classic 6 Cap
products.description: The love for Toronto a.k.a the 6 is real, and we're always repping for the home team. The 6ix cap represents Torontos unique culture and its impact on the world around it. It's alot of love when you're wearing this dad hat, full of the gritty city pride we've grown to love and embrace.

products.name: Blessed Beanie
products.description: Stay blessed all winter long! If winter is your thing then you're truly blessed to not be bothered by the cold, but if that day does come and you need protection the blessed beanie will hold you down.

13.title: BLK & Proud Forever
13.subtitle: BLK & Proud Forever was started in 2019 for a family that was in need of some custom apparel that could display their Black pride. Our goal is to provide some great BLK&Proud gear that supports, celebrates and amplifies the dopeness in being Blackity Black Black 365.

13.title: Criminal Justice Facts
13.subtitle: The Sentencing Project compiles state-level criminal justice data from a variety of sources. Using this state-by-state data feature, you can navigate between interactive maps, tables, and rankings that allow you to access and use these data.

14.title: How we're priming some kids for college — and others for prison
14.subtitle: In the United States, two institutions guide teenagers on the journey to adulthood: college and prison. Sociologist Alice Goffman spent six years in a troubled Philadelphia neighborhood and saw first-hand how teenagers of African-American and Latino backgrounds are funneled down the path to prison — sometimes starting with relatively minor infractions. In an impassioned talk she asks, "Why are we offering only handcuffs and jail time?"

14.title: Book: Understanding Mass Incarceration
14.subtitle: A People's Guide to the Key Civil Rights Struggle of Our Time

15.title: The Words of Martin Luther King Jr. Reverberate in a Tumultuous Time
15.subtitle: Dr. King’s speeches have particular resonance today amid a year of sickness and death, Black Lives Matter protests and the storming of the Capitol.

15.title: Hair: Last Week Tonight with John Oliver
15.subtitle: John Oliver discusses the importance of Black hair, the ways it can be a target of discrimination, and some ideas to address that.

16.title: Yelani
16.subtitle: Yelani products are specifically designed and created for women with naturally curly hair. The product line features chemical free hair care products made from 100% natural ingredients.

products.name: Moisture Blast Conditioning Shampoo
products.description: Infused with natural and top quality ingredients known for their moisturizing properties, our Moisture Blast Conditioning Shampoo gently hydrates, strengthens, deeply moisturizes and revitalizes dull and dry hair.

products.name: Herbal Beard Oil
products.description: Infused with a refreshing blend of all natural ingredients – grape seed, natural oils, essential fatty acids, jojoba and vitamin E – Yelani Men Beard Oil is essential for your beard needs.

products.name: Hand Sanitizer - Rosemary
products.description: Our 8 oz,  liquid hand sanitizer is easily applied with a fine mist spray. It contains 70% alcohol and ships from within the USA.

16.title: Southern Elegance Candle Co.

products.name: Tumbler Candle

products.name: Large 16oz Mason Jar Candle
products.description: Modern Values. Southern Charm This collection of candles feature 12 fragrant scents.

products.name: Signature Year Round Scents Diffuser with Reeds
products.description: A Reed Diffuser is a great solution for offices, small rooms, or any place when a flame isn't desired. Each Reed Diffuser is a 6-ounce square glass bottle with a replaceable seal. Each bottle comes with its own set of 8 reeds.

17.title: Grace X Originals LLC
17.subtitle: Grace X Originals is a "Slow Fashion" Streetwear & Lifestyle Brand. We take our time to expertly hand-dye our textiles and apply high-end airbrush artistry to our designs with sustainable fashion practices foremost in mind.

17.title: 3 Drs. & A Plan
17.subtitle:
3 Drs. & A Plan was created out of the drive to help goal-driven educators pursue their dreams. You have a bright future ahead of you but you may not know the right steps to take or how to get started. With our trained life coaches and educational career advisors, we will help you set attainable goals and create the right plan to make your hopes and wishes come true. 

As a life coach and career consultant, we help teachers deal with issues on an individual basis and determine the proper strategy for their needs.

18.title: POWERHANDZ
18.subtitle: POWERHANDZ is a global company that manufactures unique skill development products used by thousands of professional and youth athletes in multiple sports.

products.name: Basketball Gift Set

18.title: Knock Your Socks Off
18.subtitle: Created from an appreciation for high-quality socks that make a lasting impression and backed by years of retail buying experience, Knock Your Socks Off (aka KYSO) was founded in 2016 in Toronto, Canada.

products.name: Above the Clouds Women's Ankle Socks
products.description: Ultra soft fabric, made from a blend of 80% combed cotton. Fits just above the ankle. Fits Women's shoe size 6-11

products.description: Ultra soft fabric, made from a blend of 80% combed cotton. Fits mid-calf length. Fits US men shoe size 7-12

19.title: Remembering South African leader Nelson Mandela
19.subtitle: Nelson Mandela, the first black president of South Africa credited with ending apartheid there, died in Johannesburg on Dec. 5, 2013. Former PBS NewsHour correspondent Charlayne Hunter-Gault takes a look back at Mandela's life and legacy.

19.title: Very Puzzled
19.subtitle: As a parent it can be quite challenging to find items such as books and toys that are representative of the diverse society that we live in.  It is important that children see other people that look different to themselves in the books and toys that they interact with to ensure that they appreciate their own heritage and respect the heritage and culture of others.

products.name: 100 piece Africa Map Giant Jigsaw Puzzle
products.description: Puzzles are really great way for you and your extended family to bond with a child.  The very puzzled Africa Map Puzzle is definitely something that you can get stuck into that is rewarding with 100 pieces and each country on the continent of Africa is represented with a variety of landmarks, monuments and attractions it will provide endless fun and topics of discussion that can be used as fun way to learn for both children and adults.

products.name: Ethiopia colour-in t-shirt
products.description: The Ethiopia colour-in t-shirt makes perfect gift for any child with a creative edge or a group activity for parties or play dates.⁠

products.name: Ghana Map Poster
products.description: The Very Puzzled Ghana map poster is an A2 poster that accurately reflects the map of Ghana each region of Ghana is represented with a variety of landmarks, monuments and attractions it will provide endless fun and topics of discussion that can be used as fun way to learn for both children and adults.

20.title: Bossa Bars
20.subtitle: Energy bars formulated for women perimenopause to post to help support daily nutritional needs and keep that sneaky extra 10 pounds under control!

20.title: Open a random campaign to donate to
20.subtitle: Take the effort of decision out of it — tap here and we'll select a random campaign for you to support!

21.title: The Bail Project
21.subtitle: The Bail Project™ National Revolving Bail Fund is on a mission to combat mass incarceration and reshape the pretrial system in the United States. 100% of online donations are used to bring people home. Since bail money comes back to us when cases close, we're able to recycle every dollar donated at least twice per year.

21.title: The Hate U Give
21.subtitle: Based on the best-selling novel, The Hate U Give tells the story of Starr Carter, who lives in two worlds: the poor, black neighborhood where she resides and the mostly white prep school she attends. This uneasy balance is shattered when she witnesses the fatal shooting of her childhood friend by a policeman. Facing pressures from all sides, Starr must find her voice and stand up for what’s right.

22.title: AcARRE
22.subtitle: AcARRE™ is a natural prestige brand of multi-use bioactive beauty products for the beauty minimalist to age beautifully, based on modernized African and Pacific Islander ancestry elements delivering multi-level benefits, bringing balance to the skin.

22.title: Sweet Pea Books Inc
22.subtitle: Sweet Pea Books is dedicated to producing multicultural books that expose, inspire, amuse, and foster a love of reading in all children. Sweet Pea Books aims to promote the development of good character by teaching values through literature as well as expose young readers to different cultures.

products.name: D Is For Dragon Fruit (Hardcover)
products.description: D is for Dragon Fruit is a vibrantly illustrated, exotic fruit alphabet book that exposes children to a variety of nutritious fruits, reinforces the alphabet and expands a child’s knowledge of the world.

products.name: When Mama Braids My Hair (Hardcover)
products.description: When Mama Braids My Hair captures a young girl’s experience of having her hair braided and the bond it creates with her mother. The tradition of African hair braiding is more than just a Sunday routine. Come join Nikki on an adventure as she is transformed into an Egyptian queen, a Nigerian goddess, a Zulu warrior, and a Maasai girl.

products.name: Elephants Don't Have Stripes! (COMING SOON!)
products.description: Elephants Don’t Have Stripes! Deep in the valley, in the dry grasslands of the African savanna, a young elephant admires other animals for their beauty. He yearns to look and act more like them. One by one, each wish comes true and the young elephant couldn’t be happier.

23.title: Reconstruction in America
23.subtitle: Read the Equal Justice Initiative's report on racial violence after the Civil War, from 1865-1876.

23.title: Book: The Global Beauty Industry
23.subtitle: Colorism, Racism, and the National Body

24.title: Racial Literacy: A Call to Action for Teachers
24.subtitle: Uprisings in the wake of George Floyd’s death at the hands of police and the worldwide reaction demanding racial justice represented a wake-up moment for schools. Talking about race will be essential if we are going to serve all students well.

24.title: Black Lives Matter
24.subtitle: We appreciate your support of the movement and our ongoing fight to end state-sanctioned violence, liberate Black people, and end white supremacy forever.

25.title: Askanya
25.subtitle: Les Chocolateries Askanya is Haiti’s first and only premier bean-to-bar chocolate company. We exclusively use Haitian cacao to produce our chocolates in our facility located in Ouanaminthe, Haiti.

products.name: Bouquet Vert
products.description: Bouquet Vert is our Lime Chocolate Bar - a dark and rich cacao bar infused with with mellow, floral and citrus - feels like a rich earth and lime trees in full bloom. There are notes of candied lime and something toasty. It's a slow melt, but that only helps savoring each new layer of flavor.

products.name: Paradis
products.description: Paradis has a rich and creamy texture, with delicious chocolate flavors and subtle fruit flavors, providing additional complexity.

products.name: Wanga Nègès
products.description: Wanga Nègès is creamy and smooth, with a rich, chocolate taste and a complex mélange, from caramel to dried fruit.

25.title: Color blind or color brave?
25.subtitle: The subject of race can be very touchy. As finance executive Mellody Hobson says, it's a "conversational third rail." But, she says, that's exactly why we need to start talking about it. In this engaging, persuasive talk, Hobson makes the case that speaking openly about race — and particularly about diversity in hiring — makes for better businesses and a better society.

26.title: 1619 Podcast
26.subtitle: An audio series from The Times observing the 400th anniversary of the beginning of American slavery.

26.title: Racially Targeted Arrests in the Era of Marijuana Reform
26.subtitle: For decades, marijuana laws have been used to criminalize Black and Brown people, waste taxpayer money, and fuel the mass incarceration crisis. However, states across the country are taking strides toward reforming these outdated and harmful policies.

27.title: The Other Wes Moore
27.subtitle: Two kids named Wes Moore were born blocks apart within a year of each other. Both grew up fatherless in similar Baltimore neighborhoods and had difficult childhoods; both hung out on street corners with their crews; both ran into trouble with the police. How, then, did one grow up to be a Rhodes Scholar, decorated veteran, White House Fellow, and business leader, while the other ended up a convicted murderer serving a life sentence?

27.title: How to deconstruct racism, one headline at a time
27.subtitle: Baratunde Thurston explores the phenomenon of white Americans calling the police on black Americans who have committed the crimes of ... eating, walking or generally "living while black." In this profound, thought-provoking and often hilarious talk, he reveals the power of language to change stories of trauma into stories of healing — while challenging us all to level up.

28.title: Daunte's Funeral and future care of Daunte Jr.
28.subtitle: Please donate to give Daunte Wright the proper burial he deserves and to help his son and son's mother Chyna. And if you can't support financially, please send lots of prayers for the family to get through this tragic loss.

28.title: The History of Mass Incarceration
28.subtitle: From Alexis de Tocqueville to Ronald Reagan, learn more about the forces that have shaped the current state of our prison system.

29.title: Tell Congress to Support the MORE Act (H.R. 3884/S. 2227)
29.subtitle: We believe in cannabis legalization, but only if it’s got justice baked right in. Even with more and more states saying yes to legal cannabis, hundreds of thousands of people are still being arrested every year, most of them for possession—and they are disproportionately Black. It doesn’t have to be that way. With your help we can legalize cannabis while expunging prior cannabis convictions, and make 4/20 a day we all can celebrate.

29.title: Shades of My Melanin LLC
29.subtitle: At Shades of My Melanin, our goal is to not only offer products that make you feel beautiful in your own skin but to offer products that tell a story for each and every person who wears them. We offer fun, colorful, and creative products that can be worn by all ages.

30.title: National Bail Out
30.subtitle: National Bail Out is a Black-led and Black-centered collective of abolitionist organizers, lawyers and activists building a community-based movement to support our folks and end systems of pretrial detention and ultimately mass incarceration. We are people who have been impacted by cages — either by being in them ourselves or witnessing our families and loved ones be encaged. We are queer, trans, young, elder, and immigrant.

30.title: Sports Can Battle Racism Workshop
30.subtitle: A workshop for coaches on how to ensure that sports is an inclusive environment for ALL athletes.
30.moreInfo: In this 90 minute workshop, coaches will have an interactive discussion on how to combat racial discrimination, champion moral courage and empower their programs to create positive change in their communities.

31.title: Robert Tanner Freeman - Bytes of History
31.subtitle: Robert Tanner Freeman was born in Washington DC in 1846. He was the son of slaves who had bought their freedom in the 19th century. Historical records are unclear but they probably adopted the surname Freeman in response to their transition.

31.title: Airis Foods
31.subtitle: Airis Foods are hand crafted food products that add flavor and flare to all your cooking and snacking needs. With both the home cook and the commercial chef in mind, owner Airis the Chef combines simple, wholesome ingredients to create BIG FLAVOR profiles.
